thread.section_title: Paypal Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Paypal | www.paypal.com
thread.title: Quinner

author: Quinner
title: Quinner
text: This company just decide to put a limitation on your account at any time so you cant access your money for 180 days. The reason for this is that they make money on interest while the momey is resting there. You may think it will never happen to you as did i but they ruin lives ,businesses and relationships because of this and when you finally get in contact with them you are told tough sh1t. Please STAY AWAY
